name: MONO (itch) (Gravityhamster)
description:
Welcome to MONO: A small DIY puzzle platformer I made in about a week.

Features:
-Create as many levels as you’d like and save and load them back.
-Share and load .mono files saved in the appdata folder.
-Xbox controller and keyboard support.
-Edit the color palette of the game.

Credits:
All music and sounds made on the TI-83+ with irrlicht project’s Houston Tracker 2
Level editor song is a remake of Opening 2 from Mega Man 9 on the TI-83+
